title: Quantum Ensemble Learning
desc: The project aims to predict chronic liver disease using an ensemble quantum approach, combining Quantum Machine Learning (QML) and Classical Machine Learning (CML) techniques.

title: AI Summarizer
desc: Small Project to summarize the content from web page url by utilize summarising api from Rapid Api.

title: MediPal
desc: This Project aims to help users for early detections of chronical disease based on basic medical information utilzing trained ML models.

title: Quantum Blockchain
desc: This Project aims to demonstrate quantum secured blockchain on small scale that utilise quantum key exchange and lattice-based Hash Algorithm for security.

title: My NGO
desc: This Project aims to help donner and volunteer to connect to their NGOs in their locality for any form of participation using interacting UI
